languages.text: "Кто? Вы... вы из звездных детей, да? Я знал, Император не мог нас покинуть! Вы здесь, чтобы спасти нас, правда? Да благословит Трон ваши сияющие души! Я Вир, один из немногих выживших сего обездоленного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Кто? Вы... вы из звездных детей, да? Я знал, Император не мог нас покинуть! Вы здесь, чтобы спасти нас, правда? Да благословит Трон ваши сияющие души! Я Вир, один из немногих выживших сего обездоленного мира".

languages.text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."
languages.original_text: "Кто? Вы... вы из звездных детей, да? Я знал, Император не мог нас покинуть! Вы здесь, чтобы спасти нас, правда? Да благословит Трон ваши сияющие души! Я Вир, один из немногих выживших сего обездоленного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

"Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, a scout for the Children of Redemption."

"Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

"Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

"Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

languages.text: “谁？你……你是群星之子的其中一员，是吧？我就知道，帝皇不可能抛弃我们！你是来救我们的，是吗？愿黄金王座保佑你光芒夺目的灵魂！我是维尔，是这个遭到遗弃的世界中为数不多的幸存者。”
languages.original_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

traits.locale_text: “谁？你……你是群星之子的其中一员，是吧？我就知道，帝皇不可能抛弃我们！你是来救我们的，是吗？愿黄金王座保佑你光芒夺目的灵魂！我是维尔，是这个遭到遗弃的世界中为数不多的幸存者。”

languages.text: «¿Quién? Es... Es uno de los Hijos de las Estrellas, ¿verdad? ¡Sabía que el Emperador no nos abandonaría! Ha venido a salvarnos, ¿verdad? ¡Que el Trono bendiga sus almas! Soy Vir, uno de los pocos supervivientes de este mundo abandonado».
languages.original_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién? Es... Es uno de los Hijos de las Estrellas, ¿verdad? ¡Sabía que el Emperador no nos abandonaría! Ha venido a salvarnos, ¿verdad? ¡Que el Trono bendiga sus almas! Soy Vir, uno de los pocos supervivientes de este mundo abandonado».

languages.text: 「どちら様で？あなたは…星の御子らのひとり？やはり皇帝は我々を見捨てていなかった！助けに来てくれたのですね？その輝かしい魂に王座の祝福を！私はヴィル、この拠り所のない星で数少ない生き残りのひとりです」
languages.original_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

traits.locale_text: 「どちら様で？あなたは…星の御子らのひとり？やはり皇帝は我々を見捨てていなかった！助けに来てくれたのですね？その輝かしい魂に王座の祝福を！私はヴィル、この拠り所のない星で数少ない生き残りのひとりです」

languages.text: "Wer? Ihr ... Ihr seid eines der Sternenkinder, richtig? Ich wusste, der Imperator hat uns nicht im Stich gelassen! Ihr seid gekommen, um uns zu retten, nicht wahr? Der Thron segne Eure strahlenden Seelen! Ich bin Vir, einer der wenigen Überlebenden auf dieser enteigneten Welt."
languages.original_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

traits.locale_text: "Wer? Ihr ... Ihr seid eines der Sternenkinder, richtig? Ich wusste, der Imperator hat uns nicht im Stich gelassen! Ihr seid gekommen, um uns zu retten, nicht wahr? Der Thron segne Eure strahlenden Seelen! Ich bin Vir, einer der wenigen Überlebenden auf dieser enteigneten Welt."

languages.text: « Qui ça ? Vous... Vous faites partie des Enfants Stellaires ? Je savais bien que l'Empereur ne nous abandonnerait pas ! Vous êtes là pour nous sauver, pas vrai ? Le Trône bénisse vos âmes radieuses ! Moi, c'est Vir, l'un des rares survivants de ce monde en perdition. »
languages.original_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

traits.locale_text: « Qui ça ? Vous... Vous faites partie des Enfants Stellaires ? Je savais bien que l'Empereur ne nous abandonnerait pas ! Vous êtes là pour nous sauver, pas vrai ? Le Trône bénisse vos âmes radieuses ! Moi, c'est Vir, l'un des rares survivants de ce monde en perdition. »

languages.text: "Kim? Siz... Yıldız çocuklarındansınız, değil mi? İmparator'un bizi bir başımıza bırakmayacağını biliyordum! Bizi kurtarmaya geldiniz, değil mi? Taht, aydınlık ruhlarınızı kutsasın! Ben Vir, bu kimsesiz dünyada hayatta kalan birkaç kişiden biriyim."
languages.original_text: "Who? You... You are one of the star children, right? I knew the Emperor could not have abandoned us! You have come to save us, have you not? May the Throne bless your radiant souls! I am Vir, one of the few survivors on this dispossessed world."

traits.locale_text: "Kim? Siz... Yıldız çocuklarından birisiniz, değil mi? İmparator'un bizi bir başımıza bırakmayacağını biliyordum! Bizi kurtarmaya geldiniz, değil mi? Taht, aydınlık ruhlarınızı kutsasın! Ben Vir, bu kimsesiz dünyada hayatta kalan birkaç kişiden biriyim."
